name: Toke-N-Lines
description:
Toke-N-Lines is WIP game to explore "Connect-4" with extra steps.
Not much to it so far, but will add more as time passes, Enjoy!

Created for no reason other than wanting to have weird Connect-4.

Current state of the game as of Jun 9th 2022...

  • Hotseat Multiplayer only
  • Placeholder Art
  • No Sound
  • 3 Special Tokens
